text: Pokémon Channel, released in Japan as , is a virtual pet/puzzle video game made by Ambrella and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo GameCube game console. ==plot== Pokemon channel revolves around a kid getting to view a new television station created by professor oak. When the tv is delivered to the players house, a wild pikachu walks into the house and starts watching tv with you, there are different channels to view including shopin squirtle, pichu bros in party panic!, and a news channel, etc. Half way through the game, pikachu destroys your tv to have a new one delivered to your house, but you have to use a black and white tv during parts of the game. After a said interval, you will get a new color tv to play as usual until you finish testing of watching the new tv station. title: Pokémon Channel
